name: BOMBILLAS.BAS
description:
The chaps at giant bomb have decided to settle the east vs west score once and for all by climbing to the tops of buildings and hurling explosives at each other.

This is a faithful reproduction of the qbasic classic gorillas.bas. Much of the original code for building generation, explosions, and throw arc has been ported to C. Game is running in a game engine I wrote in C from scratch that emulates EGA graphical standards from the late 80's

More information on the engine project can be found at github.com/p4r4digm/sega
